title: Understanding the Concept
text: When you calculate an average from a sample, like the temperatures from $$30$$ cities, you're dealing with a specific type of data representation. This is not the entire population but a summary of the sample.

title: Defining Terms
text: A 'statistic' is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample. In this case, the average temperature is a statistic because it summarizes the data from the sample of cities.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: What is the term for a numerical value that summarizes a sample?
